DOC.brief_summary: Patients undergoing wide surgical excision of their hidradenitis suppurativa areas are asked by telephone about their quality of life by standard questionnaires (WHOQOL-BREF, DLQI, Skindex, MHF, FLQA-d) and their sexual function (FSFI, IIEF).
DOC.brief_title: Quality of Life After Wide Surgical Excision in Patients With Hidradenitis Suppurativa
DOC.criteria: Hidradenitis suppurativa that was wide excised in 2013 in Fachklinik Hornheide Agreed to retrospective analysis and questionnaires Noncompliance
